channel.title: Major problem
channel.description: Okay,so i made an ip,got a source,etc. But here's the problem : No one can connect. I've put my ip into a status checker and it says its online. But, no one can connect i put the port on 5555 when i checked it,but have recently changed the port to 43594. Has this affected it? And a while ago,i was running a server perfectly until one day people just couldn't connect.

item.title: Major problem
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

XRangdaltonX, release a new client for all your players and check to make sure that the ip for the client is correct and the port for the client is correct. Or you could just change the port back to 5555 to make it easier. But if you like port 43594 use this ^^^^^^^^

Read full topic
